intro.title: Your Beginning
intro.text: Before everything starts, choose your path.

intro_after_class.title: Tavern
intro_after_class.text: You step into an old tavern. The smell of wet wood and candle smoke fills the air.

bartender.title: Bartender
bartender.text: His eyes are sharp. "You look like someone who needs work," he says.

street.title: Street
street.text: Cold night. The city holds its breath.
